page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT - RECREATION.
page.content: ENTERTAINMENT and RECREATION. The town's{principal entertainment {attraction}is the annual{Carnival held in July and is{known}throughout the{Midlands}as the{biggest}and{best event of its kind. Throughout the {Christmas period}the town is ablaze with the colours of{seasonal {illuminations}while in{Summer}hardly a week goes by without some{attraction being{held}in the{Abbey Fields}such as the{Fire-Engine Rally,}the{Lions Fair and occasionally a{Circus}or{Funfair. {Local schools}hold their annual {Cross-country Championship}in the {Fields}and the{Two Castles Run}between {Warwick}and{Kenilworth}(June) ends at the{Castle Gates.}A major section of the{Coventry Marathon}(October) passes through the town.{Kenilworth}boasts two popular and successful{theatres: the{"Talisman"}and the{"Priory".
